verses.kjv: Now Joshua was old and stricken in years; and the LORD said unto him, Thou art old and stricken in years, and there remaineth yet very much land to be possessed.
verses.web: Now Joshua was old and well advanced in years. LORD said to him, “You are old and advanced in years, and there remains yet very much land to be possessed.
verses.ct: By this time Joshua had grown very old. The LORD said to him, "You are old and advanced in years, and there is still a great deal of land left to be taken."

verses.kjv: This is the land that yet remaineth: all the borders of the Philistines, and all Geshuri,
verses.web: “This is the land that still remains: all the regions of the Philistines, and all the Geshurites;
verses.ct: "This is the land that still remains: all the territory of the Philistines and all the region of the Geshurites,

verses.kjv: From Sihor, which is before Egypt, even unto the borders of Ekron northward, which is counted to the Canaanite: five lords of the Philistines; the Gazathites, and the Ashdothites, the Eshkalonites, the Gittites, and the Ekronites; also the Avites:
verses.web: from the Shihor, which is before Egypt, even to the border of Ekron northward, which is counted as Canaanite; the five lords of the Philistines; the Gazites, and the Ashdodites, the Ashkelonites, the Gittites, and the Ekronites; also the Avvim,
verses.ct: from the Shihor River east of Egypt all the way north to the border of Ekron — territory considered Canaanite. This includes the lands of the 5 Philistine rulers: the rulers of Gaza, Ashdod, Ashkelon, Gath, and Ekron. It also includes the territory of the Avites

verses.kjv: From the south, all the land of the Canaanites, and Mearah that is beside the Sidonians unto Aphek, to the borders of the Amorites:
verses.web: on the south; all the land of the Canaanites, and Mearah that belongs to the Sidonians, to Aphek, to the border of the Amorites;
verses.ct: to the south. Then there is all the land of the Canaanites, from Mearah (which belongs to the Sidonians) as far as Aphek, reaching to the border of the Amorites.

verses.kjv: And the land of the Giblites, and all Lebanon, toward the sunrising, from Baalgad under mount Hermon unto the entering into Hamath.
verses.web: and the land of the Gebalites, and all Lebanon, toward the sunrise, from Baal Gad under Mount Hermon to the entrance of Hamath;
verses.ct: There is also the land of the Gebalites and all of Lebanon to the east, from Baal Gad at the foot of Mount Hermon all the way to the entrance of Hamath.

verses.kjv: All the inhabitants of the hill country from Lebanon unto Misrephothmaim, and all the Sidonians, them will I drive out from before the children of Israel: only divide thou it by lot unto the Israelites for an inheritance, as I have commanded thee.
verses.web: all the inhabitants of the hill country from Lebanon to Misrephoth Maim, even all the Sidonians. I will drive them out from before the children of Israel. Just allocate it to Israel for an inheritance, as I have commanded you.
verses.ct: As for all the people living in the hill country from Lebanon to Misrephoth Maim, including all the Sidonians — I myself will drive them out ahead of the Israelites. All you need to do is divide the land among Israel by lot as their inheritance, just as I commanded you."

verses.kjv: Now therefore divide this land for an inheritance unto the nine tribes, and the half tribe of Manasseh,
verses.web: Now therefore divide this land for an inheritance to the nine tribes and the half-tribe of Manasseh.”
verses.ct: "So now, divide this land as an inheritance among the 9 remaining tribes and the half-tribe of Manasseh."

verses.kjv: With whom the Reubenites and the Gadites have received their inheritance, which Moses gave them, beyond Jordan eastward, even as Moses the servant of the LORD gave them;
verses.web: With him the Reubenites and the Gadites received their inheritance, which Moses gave them, beyond the Jordan eastward, even as Moses the servant of LORD gave them:
verses.ct: The other half of Manasseh, along with the tribes of Reuben and Gad, had already received their inheritance on the east side of the Jordan. Moses, the servant of the LORD, had given it to them.

verses.kjv: From Aroer, that is upon the bank of the river Arnon, and the city that is in the midst of the river, and all the plain of Medeba unto Dibon;
verses.web: from Aroer, that is on the edge of the valley of the Arnon, and the city that is in the middle of the valley, and all the plain of Medeba to Dibon;
verses.ct: Their territory started at Aroer on the rim of the Arnon Valley, including the city in the middle of the valley, and extended across the whole plateau of Medeba as far as Dibon.

verses.kjv: And all the cities of Sihon king of the Amorites, which reigned in Heshbon, unto the border of the children of Ammon;
verses.web: and all the cities of Sihon king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon, to the border of the children of Ammon;
verses.ct: It included all the cities of Sihon, king of the Amorites, who had ruled from Heshbon, stretching to the border of the Ammonites.

verses.kjv: And Gilead, and the border of the Geshurites and Maachathites, and all mount Hermon, and all Bashan unto Salcah;
verses.web: and Gilead, and the border of the Geshurites and Maacathites, and all Mount Hermon, and all Bashan to Salecah;
verses.ct: It also included Gilead, the territory of the Geshurites and Maacathites, all of Mount Hermon, and all of Bashan as far as Salecah —

verses.kjv: All the kingdom of Og in Bashan, which reigned in Ashtaroth and in Edrei, who remained of the remnant of the giants: for these did Moses smite, and cast them out.
verses.web: all the kingdom of Og in Bashan, who reigned in Ashtaroth and in Edrei (who was left of the remnant of the Rephaim); for Moses attacked these, and drove them out.
verses.ct: the entire kingdom of Og in Bashan, who had ruled from Ashtaroth and Edrei. Og was one of the last surviving Rephaim. Moses had defeated these kings and driven them out.

verses.kjv: Nevertheless the children of Israel expelled not the Geshurites, nor the Maachathites: but the Geshurites and the Maachathites dwell among the Israelites until this day.
verses.web: Nevertheless the children of Israel didn’t drive out the Geshurites, nor the Maacathites: but Geshur and Maacath live within Israel to this day.
verses.ct: However, the Israelites never drove out the people of Geshur and Maacath. They still live among the Israelites to this day.

verses.kjv: Only unto the tribe of Levi he gave none inheritance; the sacrifices of the LORD God of Israel made by fire are their inheritance, as he said unto them.
verses.web: Only he gave no inheritance to the tribe of Levi. The offerings of LORD, the God of Israel, made by fire are his inheritance, as he spoke to him.
verses.ct: The tribe of Levi was the only tribe that received no land as an inheritance. Instead, the fire offerings made to the LORD, the God of Israel, were their inheritance, just as he had told them.

verses.kjv: And Moses gave unto the tribe of the children of Reuben inheritance according to their families.
verses.web: Moses gave to the tribe of the children of Reuben according to their families.
verses.ct: Moses had assigned land to the tribe of Reuben, distributed by their clans.

verses.kjv: And their coast was from Aroer, that is on the bank of the river Arnon, and the city that is in the midst of the river, and all the plain by Medeba;
verses.web: Their border was from Aroer, that is on the edge of the valley of the Arnon, and the city that is in the middle of the valley, and all the plain by Medeba;
verses.ct: Their territory ran from Aroer on the rim of the Arnon Valley, including the city in the middle of the valley, and the entire plateau near Medeba.

verses.kjv: Heshbon, and all her cities that are in the plain; Dibon, and Bamothbaal, and Bethbaalmeon,
verses.web: Heshbon, and all its cities that are in the plain; Dibon, Bamoth Baal, Beth Baal Meon,
verses.ct: It included Heshbon and all its surrounding towns on the plateau: Dibon, Bamoth Baal, Beth Baal Meon,

verses.kjv: And Jahaza, and Kedemoth, and Mephaath,
verses.web: Jahaz, Kedemoth, Mephaath,
verses.ct: Jahaz, Kedemoth, Mephaath,

verses.kjv: And Kirjathaim, and Sibmah, and Zarethshahar in the mount of the valley,
verses.web: Kiriathaim, Sibmah, Zereth Shahar in the mount of the valley,
verses.ct: Kiriathaim, Sibmah, Zereth Shahar on the hill overlooking the valley,

verses.kjv: And Bethpeor, and Ashdothpisgah, and Bethjeshimoth,
verses.web: Beth Peor, the slopes of Pisgah, Beth Jeshimoth,
verses.ct: Beth Peor, the slopes of Pisgah, and Beth Jeshimoth —

verses.kjv: And all the cities of the plain, and all the kingdom of Sihon king of the Amorites, which reigned in Heshbon, whom Moses smote with the princes of Midian, Evi, and Rekem, and Zur, and Hur, and Reba, which were dukes of Sihon, dwelling in the country.
verses.web: all the cities of the plain, and all the kingdom of Sihon king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon, whom Moses struck with the chiefs of Midian, Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur, and Reba, the princes of Sihon, who lived in the land.
verses.ct: all the towns of the plateau and the entire kingdom of Sihon, king of the Amorites, who had ruled from Heshbon. Moses had defeated him along with the Midianite chiefs — Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur, and Reba — who were princes allied with Sihon and lived in that region.

verses.kjv: Balaam also the son of Beor, the soothsayer, did the children of Israel slay with the sword among them that were slain by them.
verses.web: The children of Israel also killed Balaam the son of Beor, the soothsayer, with the sword, among the rest of their slain.
verses.ct: Among those the Israelites killed in battle was Balaam son of Beor, the soothsayer, who died by the sword.

verses.kjv: And the border of the children of Reuben was Jordan, and the border thereof. This was the inheritance of the children of Reuben after their families, the cities and the villages thereof.
verses.web: The border of the children of Reuben was the bank of the Jordan. This was the inheritance of the children of Reuben according to their families, the cities and its villages.
verses.ct: The western boundary of Reuben's territory was the Jordan River. This was the inheritance of the tribe of Reuben, distributed by their clans — all these cities and their surrounding villages.

verses.kjv: And Moses gave inheritance unto the tribe of Gad, even unto the children of Gad according to their families.
verses.web: Moses gave to the tribe of Gad, to the children of Gad, according to their families.
verses.ct: Moses also assigned land to the tribe of Gad, distributed by their clans.

verses.kjv: And their coast was Jazer, and all the cities of Gilead, and half the land of the children of Ammon, unto Aroer that is before Rabbah;
verses.web: Their border was Jazer, and all the cities of Gilead, and half the land of the children of Ammon, to Aroer that is near Rabbah;
verses.ct: Their territory included Jazer, all the cities of Gilead, and half the land of the Ammonites, reaching as far as Aroer near Rabbah.

verses.kjv: And from Heshbon unto Ramathmizpeh, and Betonim; and from Mahanaim unto the border of Debir;
verses.web: and from Heshbon to Ramath Mizpeh, and Betonim; and from Mahanaim to the border of Debir;
verses.ct: It stretched from Heshbon to Ramath Mizpeh and Betonim, and from Mahanaim to the border of Debir.

verses.kjv: And in the valley, Betharam, and Bethnimrah, and Succoth, and Zaphon, the rest of the kingdom of Sihon king of Heshbon, Jordan and his border, even unto the edge of the sea of Chinnereth on the other side Jordan eastward.
verses.web: and in the valley, Beth Haram, Beth Nimrah, Succoth, and Zaphon, the rest of the kingdom of Sihon king of Heshbon, the Jordan’s bank, to the uttermost part of the sea of Chinnereth beyond the Jordan eastward.
verses.ct: In the valley it included Beth Haram, Beth Nimrah, Succoth, and Zaphon — the rest of the kingdom of Sihon, king of Heshbon. The Jordan formed the western border, extending north to the far end of the Sea of Chinnereth on the east side of the Jordan.

verses.kjv: This is the inheritance of the children of Gad after their families, the cities, and their villages.
verses.web: This is the inheritance of the children of Gad according to their families, the cities and its villages.
verses.ct: This was the inheritance of the tribe of Gad, distributed by their clans — all these cities and their surrounding villages.

verses.kjv: And Moses gave inheritance unto the half tribe of Manasseh: and this was the possession of the half tribe of the children of Manasseh by their families.
verses.web: Moses gave an inheritance to the half-tribe of Manasseh. It was for the half-tribe of the children of Manasseh according to their families.
verses.ct: Moses also assigned land to the half-tribe of Manasseh, distributed by their clans.

verses.kjv: And their coast was from Mahanaim, all Bashan, all the kingdom of Og king of Bashan, and all the towns of Jair, which are in Bashan, threescore cities:
verses.web: Their border was from Mahanaim, all Bashan, all the kingdom of Og king of Bashan, and all the villages of Jair, which are in Bashan, sixty cities.
verses.ct: Their territory started at Mahanaim and included all of Bashan — the entire kingdom of Og, king of Bashan — along with all 60 towns of Jair in Bashan.

verses.kjv: And half Gilead, and Ashtaroth, and Edrei, cities of the kingdom of Og in Bashan, were pertaining unto the children of Machir the son of Manasseh, even to the one half of the children of Machir by their families.
verses.web: Half Gilead, Ashtaroth, and Edrei, the cities of the kingdom of Og in Bashan, were for the children of Machir the son of Manasseh, even for the half of the children of Machir according to their families.
verses.ct: Half of Gilead, plus Ashtaroth and Edrei (the royal cities of Og's kingdom in Bashan), went to the descendants of Machir son of Manasseh — specifically to half of Machir's clans.

verses.kjv: These are the countries which Moses did distribute for inheritance in the plains of Moab, on the other side Jordan, by Jericho, eastward.
verses.web: These are the inheritances which Moses distributed in the plains of Moab, beyond the Jordan at Jericho, eastward.
verses.ct: These are the territories that Moses distributed on the plains of Moab, east of the Jordan across from Jericho.

verses.kjv: But unto the tribe of Levi Moses gave not any inheritance: the LORD God of Israel was their inheritance, as he said unto them.
verses.web: But Moses gave no inheritance to the tribe of Levi. LORD, the God of Israel, is their inheritance, as he spoke to them.
verses.ct: But Moses gave no land inheritance to the tribe of Levi. The LORD, the God of Israel, himself was their inheritance, just as he had promised them.
